General.Name: Adams Plc
General.Description: Adams Plc is a venture capital fund specializing in early stage investments. It prefers to invest in the biotechnology sector, life sciences and technology sectors but will also consider investments in other sectors. It focuses its investments in small and medium sized enterprises based in UK and Europe but will also consider other parts of the world. It invests in public and private firms. It can hold a minority of a majority share in its portfolio companies.
General.Address: 122 Hudson Street, New York, NY, United States, 10013
